subject: Simsonn Pedals video review
description_text:
Hi there,

I'm a sim racing enthusiast, and was inquiring to ask about doing a video
review of your Simsonn Plus X pedals in exchange for a pedal set? I do lots
of reviews for products on Amazon. Here is my profile:

https://www.amazon.com/shop/mrittman?ref_=cm_sw_r_mwn_aipsfshop_3HASJZ1AK7MBV6WHE17S&language=en-US

I would love to help if I can! Thanks so much,
Matt

-- 
*matt rittman*
www.mattrittman.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt Rittman,  ​which model do you want?

Hi, could I do the Black Plus X-P2-H2-Plate?
[image: 71HNTqWYLgL._SL1500_.jpg]

On Wed, Dec 17, 2025 at 4:14 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Matt Rittman,  OK, please provide your shipping address. We will ship it next week. Please place the video in the following product link：  https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0G2LMWHN9?th=1

Will do! Here is my shipping address:

Matt Rittman
905 SE Westgate Dr.
Waukee, IA 50263

Thanks so much!

*matt rittman*
www.mattrittman.com


On Thu, Dec 18, 2025 at 2:32 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi, just curious if you might be able to provide shipment information?

Kind regards,
Matt

On Fri, Dec 19, 2025 at 2:05 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi ​Matt Rittman,   This product won't be available in our US warehouse until next week, and we will ship it then.

Oh ok that’s great, thank you so much!

Matt
